blogPost.excerpt: Meet Lola AI, your new smart writing assistant that transforms bullet-points into clear, complete and compelling emails!
blogPost.body: Meet Lola AI, your new smart writing assistant that transforms bullet-points into clear, complete and compelling emails!
blogPost.title: Lola AI - AI-powered emails in seconds
blogPost.author: Albert Tamman

localize.description: 见识一下Lola AI，你的新智能写作助手，它能将要点转化为清晰、完整、有说服力的邮件！你可以通过Lola AI将你的邮件转化为清晰、完整、有说服力的邮件。
localize.tagline: 几秒钟内就能收到AI驱动的电子邮件

localize.description: 見識一下Lola AI，你的新智能寫作助手，它能將要點轉化爲清晰、完整、有說服力的郵件！你可以通過Lola AI將你的郵件轉化爲清晰、完整、有說服力的郵件。
localize.tagline: 幾秒鐘內就能收到AI驅動的電子郵件

previous.excerpt: Skizzle is a chrome extension for Gmail that makes end-to-end encryption dead easy - No passwords to remember, share or manage - Send encrypted attachments to any Gmail address - Verify file access on a public blockchain - Generous Free Forever plan
previous.title: Skizzle - End-to-end encrypted attachments in Gmail

localize.description: Skizzle是Gmail的chrome扩展，让端到端加密变得简单--无需记忆、分享或管理密码--向任何Gmail地址发送加密附件--在公共区块链上验证文件访问--慷慨的免费永久计划。
Skizzle是Gmail的chrome擴展，讓端到端加密變得簡單--無需記憶、分享或管理密碼--向任何Gmail地址發送加密附件--在公共區塊鏈上驗證文件訪問--慷慨的免費永久計劃。

next.excerpt: Milk Video is a web app for marketers to turn webinars into designed video highlights in minutes. Effortlessly clip, caption, and design recordings to share the best moments in engaging videos. YC W21
next.title: Milk Video - Turn webinars into designed video highlights in minutes

localize.description: 牛奶视频是一个网络应用，让营销人员在几分钟内将网络研讨会变成设计的视频亮点。毫不费力地剪辑、添加字幕和设计录音，在引人入胜的视频中分享最精彩的时刻。YC W21
localize.tagline: 在几分钟内将网络研讨会变成设计好的视频亮点

localize.description: 牛奶視頻是一個網絡應用，讓營銷人員在幾分鐘內將網絡研討會變成設計的視頻亮點。毫不費力地剪輯、添加字幕和設計錄音，在引人入勝的視頻中分享最精彩的時刻。YC W21
localize.tagline: 在幾分鐘內將網絡研討會變成設計好的視頻亮點
